quest.name: Louder than Words
journal: Tapklix accuses you of being a thief sent by the Illuminati. Uninterested in your words, he insists that you let your actions attest to your innocence by finding and eliminating an Illuminati patrol.
You stop the patrol in its tracks and leave no survivors. However, you sense there are yet more Illuminati lurking nearby. Find them and eliminate them.
The last of the Illuminati have been dealt with. Return to Tapklix now that your allegiance is clear.

Tapklix is glad to have seen your battle against the Illuminati. Using the age-old logic that the enemy of his enemy is his friend, he concludes that you are a true friend to the goblins of Idyllshire.
objectives: Slay Illuminati patrols at the designated area.
Slay Illuminati at the other designated area.

dialogue.name: TAPKLIX
dialogue.text:
Pshhh... Shkohhh...
You are stranger! You are sneakypeeker! You are thief working for Illuminati!

dialogue.name: TAPKLIX
dialogue.text: You can't take these things! No, no, no! They are for all to enjoy! But Illuminati always try to steal and hide things. Tapklix must be on constant guard.

dialogue.name: TAPKLIX
dialogue.text: If you say you are gobbiefriend, then prove it! Find Illuminati and defeat them. Drive them away from this place!

dialogue.name: TAPKLIX
dialogue.text: Prove you are gobbiefriend! Find Illuminati and defeat them!

dialogue.name: TAPKLIX
dialogue.text: Prove you are gobbiefriend! Find Illuminati and defeat them!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: There shehe is! Kill herhim!

dialogue.name: TAPKLIX
dialogue.text:
Pshhh... Shkohhh...
You slew Illuminati fightyforce! You are true gobbiefriend.

dialogue.name: TAPKLIX
dialogue.text: The things here are for all people of Idyllshire. But Illuminati try to steal them away!

dialogue.name: TAPKLIX
dialogue.text: Illuminati is our enemy. Illuminati is your enemy. This means you are our friend!
